successfulAttack.text: [Player One] dribbled past [Player Two] and scored a stunning goal! 65 points to [Player One] !
With a quick flick, [Player One] left [Player Two] grabbing at air. Goal! 65 points for [Player One] !
[Player One] delivered a perfect cross to the teammate who scored with ease. Assist! 25 points for [Player One] !
A smooth pass from [Player One] left [Player Two] spinning. 10 points for the pass!

successfulDefense.text: The ball explodes into gore as [Player Two] blocks it. [Player One] realizes those weren't regulation soccer balls.
A sickening crunch echoes as the deflected ball finds a target in the crowd. [Player One] gulps at the 'sudden death' implications.
In a shocking twist, [Player One]'s shoelaces vanish along with the ball. [Player Two] 's kleptomania strikes again!
The ball rebounds off [Player One] 's face, leaving a perfect spherical imprint. 'That's one way to get ahead,' the announcer cackles.

successfulAttack.text: [Player One] swung for the fences and nailed a homerun past [Player Two] 's desperate dive. 50 points!
A powerful hit by [Player One] sends the ball flying! [Player Two] can't catch up. Triple and 30 points!
[Player One] smashed a double, leaving [Player Two] scrambling. 20 points scored!
[Player One] hits a clean single. [Player Two] couldn't stop it. 10 points!

successfulDefense.text: A mid-swing tackle sends the bat flying, impaling an unfortunate mascot. [Player One] reconsiders the meaning of 'strike'.
Acid-filled baseball meets goalie's gloves. The crowd goes wild for this 'corrosive play' as [Player Two] watches their hands melt.
[Player One] winces as [Player Two] 's teeth spell 'NO POINTS' on the ground. Dental insurance suddenly seems underpriced.
The ball vanishes down [Player Two] 's throat. 'Ball retrieval will be interesting,' muses the announcer as [Player One] backs away.

successfulAttack.text: [Player One] sinks a three-pointer from downtown, leaving [Player Two] helpless. 30 points!
A smooth layup by [Player One] leaves [Player Two] in the dust. Basket and 15 points!
[Player One] fakes and scores an easy basket while [Player Two] watches in disbelief. 15 points!
[Player One] grabs a rebound and puts it back in! 10 points for [Player One]!

successfulDefense.text: [Player One] soars through the air post-tackle. The crowd bets on their landing section as medics prepare for the worst.
A human-sized flyswatter appears where [Player Two] stood. [Player One] blinks, cursing the league's genetic modification clause.
A sudden force field sends [Player One] crashing down. They rue the day 'Science Division' players were allowed to compete.
'Elastic limb surgery paying off!' shouts the announcer. [Player One] gapes at [Player Two] 's impossibly long arms.

successfulAttack.text: [Player One] blasts the ball past [Player Two] 's bat. Goal! 65 points to [Player One] !
A clever assist from [Player One] sets up the goal. 25 points for [Player One] !
[Player One] weaves through and scores while [Player Two] swings at air. Goal! 65 points!
A swift pass from [Player One] leaves [Player Two] flailing. 10 points for the pass!

successfulDefense.text: Shreds of soccer ball fall from [Player Two]'s teeth. [Player One] reconsiders the term 'mouthguard' in this league.
Titanium soccer ball meets bat. As shrapnel flies, [Player One] ducks and questions equipment regulations.
The ball disintegrates mid-air. 'Particle cleanup on field three!' chimes the announcer as [Player One] coughs up dust.
[Player Two] vanishes into the earth. 'We'll retrieve them for the next game,' sighs the coach as [Player One] stares at the hole.

successfulAttack.text: [Player One] smashes the ball out of the park while [Player Two] can only watch. Home run! 50 points!
A rocket hit by [Player One] results in a triple. [Player Two] couldn't even jump high enough! 30 points!
[Player One] hits a solid double, leaving [Player Two] staring in disbelief. 20 points!
[Player One] taps a single and dashes to first base before [Player Two] can react. 10 points!

successfulDefense.text: Leather confetti rains down as baseball meets basketball. [Player One] ducks the debris, wincing at the crowd's screams.
A well-timed sneeze sends the ball pinballing around the field. 'Bless you,' mutters [Player One], eyeing the chaos warily.
[Player One] blinks at their empty hands. In the distance, their bat serves as an impromptu pogo stick.
'Temporal interference!' cries [Player One] as their pitch vanishes through a sudden wormhole. Paradox alarms blare.

successfulAttack.text: [Player One] bends it like Beckham past [Player Two]. Goal! 65 points to [Player One] !
A slick assist from [Player One] leads to an easy goal. 25 points!
[Player One] outmaneuvers [Player Two] and scores a fantastic goal. 65 points!
[Player One] makes a sharp pass that leaves [Player Two] scrambling. 10 points!

successfulDefense.text: Both players phase through the pitch. 'Cleanup on aisle car,' sighs the announcer, eyeing the new holes in the parking lot.
A black hole swallows the ball mid-shot. [Player One] wishes they'd paid attention in quantum physics class.
[Player One] leaves a perfect outline in the suddenly-appearing brick wall. The crowd cheers for the Looney Tunes physics.
A 50-foot giant intercepts the pass. [Player One] squints at the fine print on 'performance-enhancing' substances.

successfulAttack.text: [Player One] nails a three-pointer, leaving [Player Two] flat-footed. 30 points!
A perfect dunk by [Player One] over [Player Two]. 15 points!
[Player One] snatches the rebound and scores! 10 points!
With a swift move, [Player One] scores an easy basket. 15 points!

successfulDefense.text: 'Heartbreaking defense!' quips the announcer as the ball embeds in [Player One] 's chest. Medics rush for impromptu surgery.
The scoreboard flashes negative infinity as the deflected ball fries its circuits. Both teams sigh at the prospect of eternal gameplay.
[Player One] hops around panic-stricken as their detached arm is used to dribble. 'Spare parts department to the court,' calls the referee.
NASA tracks the hyper-rebounded ball's journey to Mars. [Player One] ponders the possibility of interplanetary points.

successfulAttack.text: [Player One] hits a monster homerun over the fence while [Player Two] watches it sail. 50 points!
A powerful hit by [Player One] results in a triple. [Player Two] can't reach it in time! 30 points!
[Player One] lines a double down the line, leaving [Player Two] chasing shadows. 20 points!
[Player One] taps a single past [Player Two] 's glove. 10 points!

successfulDefense.text: The 'baseball' detonates on impact. [Player One] gulps, remembering the 'explosive play' clause in their contract.
A chest-mounted baseball magnet is revealed. [Player One] wonders if the 'cyborg league' rumors were true all along.
A giant mitt materializes mid-field. [Player One] makes a note to check their opponent for 'Transformers' lineage.
The entire stadium tilts as a sinkhole appears. [Player One] clings to the pitching mound, questioning their life choices.

successfulDefense.text: The mitt explodes on impact. [Player One] dodges leather shrapnel, pondering the wisdom of cross-sport equipment.
Bat meets ball in a shower of splinters. [Player One] considers 'extreme woodworking' as a fallback career.
'Touchdown!' cries the confused umpire as the basketball achieves orbit. [Player One] sighs at the sport mixture.
A dimensional rift swallows the diving defender. [Player One] wonders if teleportation is standard in this dystopian baseball.
